languages.text: "Арлекины исполняют Танец Без Конца — трагедию о прошлом нашего народа. Среди прочих ролей в нем есть одна, которую могут исполнять только Аребенниан... Роль Врага — Той, Что Жаждет, презренной {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Сай'лантреш{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "Арлекины исполняют Танец Без Конца — трагедию о прошлом нашего народа. Среди прочих ролей в нем есть одна, которую могут исполнять только Аребенниан... Роль Врага — Той, Что Жаждет, презренной {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Сай'лантреш{/g}".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Harlequins perform the Dance Without End — the tragedy of our people's past. There is one role which only an Arebennian may perform... the role of the Enemy — She Who Thirsts, the reviled {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}."
languages.original_text: "Арлекины исполняют Танец Без Конца — трагедию о прошлом нашего народа. Среди прочих ролей в нем есть одна, которую могут исполнять только Аребенниан... Роль Врага — Той, Что Жаждет, презренной {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Сай'лантреш{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "Harlequins perform the Dance Without End — the tragedy of our people's past. There is one role which only an Arebennian may perform... the role of the Enemy — She Who Thirsts, the reviled Sai'lanthresh."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Harlequins perform the Dance Without End — the tragedy of our people's past. There is one role which only an Arebennian may perform... the role of the Enemy — She Who Thirsts, the reviled {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “丑角表演的是永不停歇的舞蹈，表演的是我们的族人曾经遭遇的劫难。而其中有一个角色，只有独角才能扮演……那就是我们的宿敌，饥渴女士，被所有人痛恨的{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}赛·兰斯雷什{/g}。”
languages.original_text: "Harlequins perform the Dance Without End — the tragedy of our people's past. There is one role which only an Arebennian may perform... the role of the Enemy — She Who Thirsts, the reviled {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}."

traits.locale_text: “丑角表演的是永不停歇的舞蹈，表演的是我们的族人曾经遭遇的劫难。而其中有一个角色，只有独角才能扮演……那就是我们的宿敌，饥渴女士，被所有人痛恨的{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}赛·兰斯雷什{/g}。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Los Arlequines interpretan el Baile Sin Fin: la tragedia pasada de nuestro pueblo. Solo hay un papel reservado exclusivamente para los Arebennian... el del Enemigo: la Sedienta, la pérfida {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}».
languages.original_text: "Harlequins perform the Dance Without End — the tragedy of our people's past. There is one role which only an Arebennian may perform... the role of the Enemy — She Who Thirsts, the reviled {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}."

traits.locale_text: «Los Arlequines interpretan el Baile Sin Fin: la tragedia pasada de nuestro pueblo. Solo hay un papel reservado exclusivamente para los Arebennian... el del Enemigo: la Sedienta, la pérfida {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「ハーレクィンは民の過去の悲劇を表す『終わりなき舞踏』を演じる。悪名高い{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}セランスレッシュ{/g}…かの渇きたる女という敵の役を演じることができるのは、アーベニアンだけだ」
languages.original_text: "Harlequins perform the Dance Without End — the tragedy of our people's past. There is one role which only an Arebennian may perform... the role of the Enemy — She Who Thirsts, the reviled {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}."

traits.locale_text: 「ハーレクィンは民の過去の悲劇を表す『終わりなき舞踏』を演じる。悪名高い{g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}セランスレッシュ{/g}…かの渇きたる女という敵の役を演じることができるのは、アーベニアンだけだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Harlekine führen den Endlosen Tanz auf — die Tragödie der Vergangenheit unseres Volks. Ein Arebennian darf nur eine Rolle spielen ... die Rolle des Feindes. Die Rolle von Ihr, die dürstet, der verhassten {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}."
languages.original_text: "Harlequins perform the Dance Without End — the tragedy of our people's past. There is one role which only an Arebennian may perform... the role of the Enemy — She Who Thirsts, the reviled {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Harlekine führen den Endlosen Tanz auf — die Tragödie der Vergangenheit unseres Volks. Ein Arebennian darf nur eine Rolle spielen ... die Rolle des Feindes. Die Rolle von Ihr, die dürstet, der verhassten {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Les Arlequins effectuent la Danse sans Fin, la tragédie du passé de notre peuple, dont l'un des rôles ne peut être tenu que par un Arebennian : celui de l'ennemie, l'Assoiffée, {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g} l'infâme. »
languages.original_text: "Harlequins perform the Dance Without End — the tragedy of our people's past. There is one role which only an Arebennian may perform... the role of the Enemy — She Who Thirsts, the reviled {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}."

traits.locale_text: « Les arlequins effectuent la Danse sans Fin, la tragédie du passé de notre peuple, dont l'un des rôles ne peut être tenu que par un arebennian : celui de l'ennemie, l'Assoiffée, {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g} l'infâme. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Arlekenler, halkımızın geçmişteki trajedilerini anlatan Sonu Gelmeyen Dans'ı sergilerler. Bu gösteride yalnızca bir Arebennian tarafından sergilenebilecek bir rol bulunur: Düşmanımız Susayan'ın, yerden yere vurulan {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh'in{/g} rolü..."
languages.original_text: "Harlequins perform the Dance Without End — the tragedy of our people's past. There is one role which only an Arebennian may perform... the role of the Enemy — She Who Thirsts, the reviled {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Arlekenler, halkımızın geçmişteki trajedilerini anlatan Sonu Gelmeyen Dans'ı sergilerler. Bu gösteride yalnızca bir Arebennian tarafından sergilenebilecek bir rol bulunur: Düşmanımız Susayan'ın, yerden yere vurulan {g|Encyclopedia:Sailanthresh}Sai'lanthresh{/g}'in rolü..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
